<MethodEndpoint

Updates user information in all spaces.

**Permissions:**
`Open Access (Consumers)`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The JSON object containing the user information to update.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["ext_user_id"],"type":"object","properties":{"ref_id":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_user_id":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_email":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_username":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_first_name":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_last_name":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"address":{"type":"object","properties":{"country":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UserAddress"}},"title":"UpdateUserInfoBody"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
